error.signature: Error: dlopen failed: cannot load native module
error.regex: dlopen failed|Cannot load native module|was compiled against a different Node

verdict.summary: Native addon compiled for different Node/architecture. Need to rebuild.

dead_ends.why_fails: Native addons are platform-specific â€” compiled binaries aren't portable

dead_ends.action: Downgrade Node to match the addon
dead_ends.why_fails: Better to rebuild the addon for your current Node version

workarounds.action: Rebuild native modules: npm rebuild or rm -rf node_modules && npm install
workarounds.how:
npm rebuild
# or: npx node-gyp rebuild

workarounds.action: For Electron apps, use electron-rebuild: npx electron-rebuild
